sentences.en: Although poor Hispanic families are coming to resemble poor black families, they not feel like them.
sentences.cn: 虽然贫穷的西班牙家庭正越来越接近贫穷黑人家庭, 但是他们并不感觉像黑人家庭.

sentences.en: Among children and teens, overweight in non - Hispanic White teens is related to a lower family income.
sentences.cn: 对儿童来说, 非 西班牙裔少年肥胖与家庭低收入明显相关.

sentences.en: At that point , in 2043 , non - Hispanic whites could make up just over half the population.
sentences.cn: 到那时,2043年, 非 西班牙白人可能只占到人口的一半.

sentences.en: Ever since pre - Hispanic times, Lake Catemaco has been a centre for alternative medicine and strange treatments.
sentences.cn: 自西班牙统治前,Catemaco湖已经成为另类医术和怪异疗法的中心.

sentences.en: His family tried to assimilate into the white and Hispanic communities.
sentences.cn: 他一家人试图融入白人和西班牙裔社区。

sentences.en: Hispanic kids, two out of three ate the marshmallow.
sentences.cn: 西班牙的小孩, 三分之二吃了棉花糖.

sentences.en: If you look Hispanic, they can question you.
sentences.cn: 如果你看上去像拉美裔, 他们就会怀疑你.

sentences.en: In California, Hispanics make up 19.2 percent of the population.
sentences.cn: 在加利福尼亚，西裔美国人占总人口的19.2%。

sentences.en: In general, Hispanic persons are comfortable with personal space of less than 18 inches.
sentences.cn: 大体上, 西班牙人喜欢(与谈话者)保持小于18英寸的距离.
迈阿密的西裔美国人社区

sentences.en: Most are sold to small Hispanic and Mexican groceries, Padron said.
Rich coastal enclaves remain mostly white. Poor areas, which are mostly Hispanic, are no more diverse.
sentences.cn: 富裕的沿海飞地仍然大多归属白人, 贫穷区大多是西班牙人, 无多元可言.

sentences.en: Sala is not familiar with the Hispanic music of 18 th century.
sentences.cn: 萨拉对18世纪的西班牙音乐并不熟悉.

sentences.en: The governor of New Mexico is a Hispanic.
sentences.cn: 新墨西哥州州长即是西班牙裔.

sentences.en: The majority of the teens were non - Hispanic white, and nearly half lived with both biological parents.
sentences.cn: 青少年主要来自 非 西班牙裔白人, 其中接近一半与生身父母同住.

sentences.en: The post - traumatic stress disorder rate was highest among injured, low - income and Hispanic study volunteers.
sentences.cn: 心理障碍综合症发病率最高的人群是受伤者 、 低收入 人群和西班牙籍研究志愿者.

sentences.en: The report found that sunburn prevalence among non - Hispanic whites among Hispanics among non - Hispanic blacks.
sentences.cn: 研究发现,发生晒伤的流行病学分布如下:非西班牙白种人发病率为35.6%,西班牙人发病率为45.6%, 非 西班牙黑种人发病率为50.4%.

trans.tran_cn: 西班牙的，西班牙和葡萄牙的，西班牙及其他说西班牙语国家的，拉丁美洲的
trans.tran_en: from or relating to countries where Spanish or Portuguese are spoken, especially ones in Latin America
someone who comes from a country where Spanish or Portuguese is spoken, especially one in Latin America
